translation.main-subtitle: Nhyehyɛe a wɔde toto dwumadi a wɔtɔn mu
translation.intro-text: DA ServePro app no boa wɔn a wɔyɛ adwuma ne adwumayɛfo ma wɔn ntɔn mmoa kɔ so yie, bere biara, baabiara.
translation.feature1-text: Interface a ɛyɛ den, dwumadi a ɛnyɛ den, yɛ ntɔn mmara wɔ sɛkond biako mu.
translation.feature2-text: Hwɛ ntɔn mmara tebea wɔ nokware bere mu.
translation.feature3-text: Auto boaboa nnwuma, ntɔn mmara, nnwuma a wɔtɔn sen biara,...
translation.feature4-text: To so dwumadi foɔ na ma tumi a ɛda adi pefee ma dwumadi biara.
translation.feature5-text: Data nyinaa wɔ hɔ a wɔagye atom.
translation.feature6-text: Wɔayɛ data no nhwɛsoɔ na wo nkoaa na wowo tumi kɔ hɔ.
translation.contact-text: Sɛ wowɔ nsɛm biara anaa nsɛnnennen a, yɛsrɛ sɛ bɔ mmɔden:
translation.address: Adrɛs: 52, D1 Kwan, Phuoc Long B, Thu Duc, Ho Chi Minh Kurow, Vietnam
translation.footer-text: © 2025 DA ServePro. Wɔn nyinaa wɔ tumi.
